downloadTitle: Microsoft Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) 2003 Management Pack for Operations Manager 2007
downloadDescription: Monitors the Routing and Remote Access service (RRAS) running on Windows 2003 servers

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Windows RRAS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/b/4/cb48f384-05cc-4eb2-85d9-983eb2f3d495/Microsoft Windows RRAS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi

detailsSection:
The Microsoft Operations Manager 2007 Management Pack for Routing and Remote Access provides monitoring for RAS, VPN and Routing scenarios. Examples include:
• Automatic notification of events indicating service outages
• Performance degradation
• Health monitoring
• Centralized management


Requires OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update) 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)

Release History:
Initial Release for OpsMgr 2007 8/31/2007 Version 6.0.5000.0
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Windows RRAS 2003 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Required Software:
System Center Operations Manager 2007,
Microsoft Windows RRAS 2003
OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)
